thread.title: NANCY ALBORA

author: NANCY ALBORA
title: NANCY ALBORA
text:
I began Zip Recruiter Friday 2/11. Got started with help from Leah who was fantastic. Her knowledge, patience and professionalism made the process of getting started easy and enjoyable. I have also had the pleasure of speaking with Melissa and Max and found their assistance to be most helpful.
Zip Recruiter is by far the best search tool that I have used due to it's simplicity and clarity, the ease with which the job can be edited and the outstanding support team whose help is a phone call away allowing me to get answers to my questions promptly hassle free.
